name: part_001
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ５周年記念】５周年記念ANNIVERSARY　＂PLAN＂【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [qZaVTM0ypO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki, Ookami Mio, and Nekomata Okayu are standing in front of a green wall, discussing their plans for the day. They realize Inugami Korone is missing.
The group boards a chartered bus. They find a Korone plushie in one of the seats. Fubuki announces that they are going to Kusatsu Onsen to relax.
The group arrives at Kusatsu and visits the famous Yubatake (hot water field). They admire the scenery and the smell of sulfur before taking a commemorative photo.
The group moves to their next destination, Sainokawara Park.

subtitles.original: そんな感じだったよね
subtitles.english: It was something like that, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: うん
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: あ、ままま、今日はね、ちょっとあのゲーマーズでね、行きたい所があるんですけども
subtitles.english: Well, today, I have a place I want to go to with the Gamers.

subtitles.original: え？え？ゲーマーズ？
subtitles.english: Eh? Eh? Gamers?

subtitles.original: そう、ゲーマーズで。え？
subtitles.english: Yes, with the Gamers. Eh?

subtitles.original: ひとり足りなくない？
subtitles.english: Isn't one person missing?

subtitles.original: 足りないっすよね、見当たらない…
subtitles.english: We're missing someone. She's not here...

subtitles.original: どこ見当たらない、ですか？
subtitles.english: She's nowhere to be found, is she?

subtitles.original: あ、ままま、ちょっとね、もう一人は置いときまして
subtitles.english: Well, putting that other person aside for now...

subtitles.original: 置いとくの！？
subtitles.english: Putting her aside!?

subtitles.original: 早速バス用意してますので
subtitles.english: I've already prepared a bus.

subtitles.original: バス！？
subtitles.english: A bus!?

subtitles.original: 乗って行きましょう、レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: Let's get on. Let's go!

subtitles.original: うぇ～～い！
subtitles.english: Uweeey!

subtitles.original: よいしょ、よいしょ
subtitles.english: Heave-ho, heave-ho.

subtitles.original: え、ガチの貸切バスじゃん
subtitles.english: Whoa, it's a real chartered bus!

subtitles.original: ガチのバスでございます
subtitles.english: It is indeed a real bus.

subtitles.original: 遠足じゃん！遠足だ～！
subtitles.english: It's a field trip! A field trip!

subtitles.original: ちょっとみんなで後ろに乗って行きましょう
subtitles.english: Let's all sit in the back.

subtitles.original: えーすげー！どこ行くんだ、こんなんで？
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing! Where are we going in this?

subtitles.original: ころね～！
subtitles.english: Korone~!

subtitles.original: え？あるやんけ！嘘でしょ！？
subtitles.english: Eh? You're here! No way!

subtitles.original: どうしたの？
subtitles.english: What happened?

subtitles.original: みんな～、おあよ～おあよ～！
subtitles.english: Everyone, ohyo~ ohyo~!

subtitles.original: すんごい小っちゃくなっちゃってるけど…
subtitles.english: You've become so small...

subtitles.original: こんな姿になっちゃったぁ…
subtitles.english: To think you'd end up in this state...

subtitles.original: このころねを今日は連れていきま～す
subtitles.english: I'm taking this Korone with us today.
Eh~!? Eh~!?

subtitles.original: よろしくね
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you.

subtitles.original: ちょっと苦しそうまであるけどね
subtitles.english: She looks a bit cramped, though.

subtitles.original: ごめんね、ころね
subtitles.english: Sorry, Korone.

subtitles.original: ということで、バスの中でございますけども
subtitles.english: Anyway, we are now on the bus.

subtitles.original: 今日はこんな朝早くから集まって、どこに行くと思いますか？みんな
subtitles.english: Where do you think we're going so early this morning?

subtitles.original: いや、本当にさ、わかんないからさ
subtitles.english: I really have no idea.

subtitles.original: どこでしょ？フブキちゃんの実家
subtitles.english: Where? Fubuki-chan's parents' house?

subtitles.original: 行かないわ！！なんでやねん！
subtitles.english: No!! Why would we go there?!

subtitles.original: 違います違います。えー、違うの？
subtitles.english: Wrong, wrong. Eh, it's not?

subtitles.original: 今日はですね、まあね、日頃いっぱい遊んでもらって
subtitles.english: Today, well, since you always play with me...

subtitles.original: みんなもお仕事大変な中なので、ゆっくりしてもらおうということで
subtitles.english: ...and work so hard, I want you to relax.

subtitles.original: 今回は…草津に行きます！
subtitles.english: So this time... we're going to Kusatsu!

subtitles.original: うぇ～～い！草津ぅぅ！？
subtitles.english: Uweeey! Kusatsuuuu!?

subtitles.original: 草津と言えば？
subtitles.english: And what is Kusatsu famous for?

subtitles.original: 温泉！？
subtitles.english: Onsen!?

subtitles.original: すごくない！？台本無いのにめっちゃ被ってるよ
subtitles.english: Isn't that amazing!? We were perfectly in sync without a script!

subtitles.original: ハモりまくってるｗ ハモり具合半端なかった今
subtitles.english: We totally harmonized! That harmony was incredible just now.

subtitles.original: ま、今回なぜ草津に行きたいかと言いますと
subtitles.english: Well, as for why I wanted to go to Kusatsu...

subtitles.original: 我々さ、この長い付き合いの中で温泉行ったりさ
subtitles.english: ...we've known each other a long time and gone to hot springs...

subtitles.original: そう、グランピングとか行ったりしたけど
subtitles.english: ...and even gone glamping together.

subtitles.original: その時に「今後行きたい温泉どこが良い？」みたいな話をしたことがありまして
subtitles.english: At those times, we talked about where we'd want to go next.

subtitles.original: したっけ？そんな事。したよッ！！
subtitles.english: Did we? We did!!

subtitles.original: したんだよ！！白上は覚えてんだよ！
subtitles.english: We did!! I remember it clearly!

subtitles.original: ま、それで、行ったことないから草津温泉行きたいな、みたいな話を白上から確かしたんだよね
subtitles.english: Well, since I've never been, I said I wanted to go to Kusatsu Onsen.

subtitles.original: で、「草津もいいね」みたいな話で。なるほど
subtitles.english: And you all said Kusatsu sounded good. I see.

subtitles.original: なので、ま、今回これを機に草津温泉に行こうじゃないかと、いうことで
subtitles.english: So, I took this chance for us to go to Kusatsu Onsen.

subtitles.original: あ、まあじゃあ、フブキが行きたいからって事？
subtitles.english: Oh, so it's because you wanted to go?

subtitles.original: そうです。そういうことかあ、そうだよね
subtitles.english: Yes. I see, that's how it is.

subtitles.original: バスに揺られながらのんびりと草津へ向かおうと思いま～す
subtitles.english: We'll relax on the bus and head towards Kusatsu.

subtitles.original: もちろんここにいる、ころねも一緒なのでね
subtitles.english: And of course, Korone here is with us too.

subtitles.original: こんな姿になっちゃってｗ こんな姿になっちゃったからにはねｗ
subtitles.english: Even in that form... since you're in that state...

subtitles.original: ころねの心の声を、あら、どうだい？ちょっと聞いてみるね、一緒に
subtitles.english: Let's hear Korone's inner voice. How is it? Let's listen together.

subtitles.original: うれしいいい～！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy~!

subtitles.original: そんなんだったっけ！？うれしい、ころねも草津、すき～
subtitles.english: Was it like that!? Happy, Korone also loves Kusatsu~

subtitles.original: わあ、なんかすごいちょっと誇張されてるｗ
subtitles.english: Wow, she's exaggerating a bit!

subtitles.original: ころ様も喜んでる。喜んでる？喜んでる、おかゆが言うならまあそうか
subtitles.english: Korone-sama is happy too. Happy? She is. Well, if Okayu says so.

subtitles.original: 喜んでる喜んでる。はい、ということでね
subtitles.english: She's happy, she's happy. Well then.

subtitles.original: このままのんびりのんびり行こうと思いま～す。イェーイ！草津だ！温泉！行くぞ！
subtitles.english: We'll just take it easy. Yay! Kusatsu! Hot springs! Let's go!

subtitles.original: バスに揺られること４時間
subtitles.english: 4 hours on the bus...

subtitles.original: 草津到着！
subtitles.english: Arrived at Kusatsu!

subtitles.original: あ、この先に行くと湯畑があるらしいんですよ
subtitles.english: The Yubatake is just ahead.

subtitles.original: 湯畑？湯畑ってなに？湯葉？
subtitles.english: Yubatake? What's that? Yuba (tofu skin)?

subtitles.original: 湯葉じゃないｗ
subtitles.english: Not Yuba! (lol)

subtitles.original: まあ見ていただいたら分かります。お湯がいっぱいあるから湯畑なんじゃない？
subtitles.english: You'll see when we get there. It's called Yubatake because there's so much hot water.

subtitles.original: そういうこと！
subtitles.english: I see!

subtitles.original: そういうこと！はい、もうすごーい！わー！すごい！
subtitles.english: That's it! Wow, look at that! Wow! Amazing!

subtitles.original: 湯気が！本当だ、なんかモクモクしてる
subtitles.english: Look at the steam! It really is, it's all billowy.

subtitles.original: ね、ちょっと近く行ってみてーなー。匂いもすごい温泉の
subtitles.english: I want to get a bit closer. The smell of the hot springs is strong too.

subtitles.original: ね、硫黄の匂いがします。湯畑って感じします
subtitles.english: Yeah, it smells like sulfur. It really feels like Yubatake.

subtitles.original: え、どうなってんの、これ。すごーい！
subtitles.english: Wow, what's going on here? Amazing!

subtitles.original: うわぁ、うわぁ、すごい！
subtitles.english: Whoa, whoa, incredible!

subtitles.original: すごい、茹で卵の匂いする！
subtitles.english: Wow, it smells like boiled eggs!

subtitles.original: 茹で卵の匂い。作ってんのかな？ここで。え、茹で卵？そんな大量に…？
subtitles.english: The smell of boiled eggs. Are they making them here? Eh, boiled eggs? In such huge amounts...?

subtitles.original: 温泉！すごい凄まじい！うわ、こっちはこっちですごいね、めっちゃ綺麗！
subtitles.english: Hot springs! This is incredible! Whoa, this side is amazing too, so beautiful!

subtitles.original: うわぁ～！温泉の滝だぁ～！！
subtitles.english: Whoa~! It's an onsen waterfall!!

subtitles.original: うわぁ、温泉の滝、あっちすごいよ！ね、すごいダバーってなってる
subtitles.english: Whoa, an onsen waterfall, that's incredible! It's gushing down!

subtitles.original: ウォータースライダーみたいになってる。すごい、温泉ウォータースライダーだ！すごい！
subtitles.english: It looks like a water slide. Incredible, an onsen water slide! Wow!

subtitles.original: モクモクもすごーい！すごいね、めっちゃモアモアする！
subtitles.english: The steam is incredible! It really is, it's so thick!

subtitles.original: わ、モワッとする！うわぁぁ～！！
subtitles.english: Whoa, it's so steamy! Uwaaaaa~!!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: じゃあね、良い感じに湯畑も撮れましたので、次の目的地に行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Well, we got some good shots of the Yubatake, so let's head to our next destination!

subtitles.original: お、はい！レッツゴー！ゴーゴー！レッツゴー！ゴーゴー！
subtitles.english: Oh, okay! Let's go! Go! Go! Let's go! Go! Go!

subtitles.original: 次の目的地へ移動中
subtitles.english: Moving to the next destination...
